'''''Dreams & Gifts: The Art of Angelo Montanini''''' was an exhibition of artwork by [[Angelo Montanini]]. The exhibition, curated by Davide Martini, was held in Florence, Italy in [[2007]].<ref>{{CCGA|entry=Angelo Montanini}}, p. 192</ref> Most illustrations are inspired by the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]], although a few have themes from other fantasy worlds. An accompanying book was released the same year, which was printed in 700 copies.
==Artworks included==
A non-extensive listing based on an auction.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.finarte.it/auction/the-art-of-the-lord-of-the-rings-milan-2022-12-14?l=69&lang=en|articlename=The Art of ''The Lord of the Rings'', Angelo Montanini|website=[https://www.finarte.it Finarte]}}</ref>
